backUpCard.description: Make a copy of the seed phrase to be able to recover your wallet and avoid losing funds.

daeppBrowserCard.title: Browse the æcosystem
daeppBrowserCard.description: Explore æpps from within your wallet with the new built-in browser.

nameCard.title: Claim your own .chain name

multisig.transactionReady: Transaction is ready to be sent.
multisig.explorerLink: View smart contract in blockchain explorer

createAccount.title: Add account
createAccount.msg: Please select blockchain to add an account address to.
createAccount.msgMultisig: Generate new multisig account address and add it to your wallet.
createAccount.msgAeternity: Generate new account address to store, send and receive cryptocurrency on the æternity blockchain.
createAccount.btnSubtitle: Derive another account from your seed

transaction-failed.title: Transaction failed
transaction-failed.msg: We cannot process this transaction. Please, try again later.
transaction-failed.dustError: Transaction was rejected by the network due to dust UTXO error. {'<'}br /{'>'} {'<'}br /{'>'} Try to send funds using the MAX amount feature with a lower fee tier selected, or add more funds to your account before sending them all out.

payloadInfo.title: Payload message
payloadInfo.msg: A payload is an optional public message composed by the sender and sent to the recipient along with a blockchain transaction.{'<'}br /{'>'}{'<'}br /{'>'}Payload can be utilized as additional transaction identifier, destination tag (required by some centralized exchanges when depositing funds), or just to provide any extra information in free-form text.

payloadForm.title: Add payload (optional)
payloadForm.desc: Send a public message with your transaction for approx. 0.00000002 AE per character.
payloadForm.label: Payload message

insufficient-balance.msg: You do not have enough balance for this transaction.

vaultLowBalance.title: Insufficient vault balance
vaultLowBalance.msg: The vault does not have enough funds to pay for this transaction (proposed amount + network fee).

accountLowBalance.title: Insufficient funds
accountLowBalance.msg: You do not have enough AE on your signing account to {action} this transaction.

createMultisigAccount.title: Create new multisig vault
createMultisigAccount.addSignerHelpMsg: Each multisig transaction needs to be confirmed by the signatures of a preset number of authorized accounts.{'<'}br /{'>'}{'<'}br /{'>'}As the creator of this multisig vault you can determine the authorized signers and set the consensus required for a transaction confirmation.
createMultisigAccount.consensusRequiredHelpMsg: As the creator of this multisig vault you can determine the authorized signers and set the consensus needed for a transaction confirmation (how many signatures are required to confirm each transaction).
createMultisigAccount.errorDuplicatingSigner: You can not add the same account address as a signer more than once.
createMultisigAccount.errorNotEnoughBalanceToCreateVault: Not enough balance in this account. Creating multisig vault requires at least {0}.

creatingMultisigAccount.title: Creating vault progress
creatingMultisigAccount.vaultAccessibleMessage: Multisig vault has been successfully added to you wallet dashboard.
creatingMultisigAccount.vaultCreatedMessage: You may proceed to wallet dashboard.
creatingMultisigAccount.vaultCreatedMessageSub: Your newly created multisig vault will become visible to other authorized signers in a short period of time (usually it takes about a minute or two).
creatingMultisigAccount.addingToWallet: Adding multisig vault to the wallet
creatingMultisigAccount.takingLong: This step may take a few moments.

consensusInfo.title: Multisig consensus
consensusInfo.subtitle: X/Y of Z
consensusInfo.firstPoint: {'<'}strong{'>'}X ={'<'}/strong{'>'} accounts that have already signed the transaction;
consensusInfo.secondPoint: {'<'}strong{'>'}Y ={'<'}/strong{'>'} number of signatures required to approve the transaction;
consensusInfo.description: If {'<'}strong{'>'}X=Y{'<'}/strong{'>'} the multisig consensus has been reached. The transaction proposal has been approved and the transaction can be sent by any of the authorized signers.

verify.title: Verify your URL
verify.msg: Make sure that the public address of your Superhero Wallet account, or your .chain name, is added somewhere on the website you want to claim tips from.

publicAddress.title: Send to public address
publicAddress.msg: {0} scan QR code or manually enter recipient’s account address.

chain.title: Send to .chain name
chain.msg: {0} AENS name is a human friendly nickname ending with .chain that points to recipient’s æccount. Before sending any funds make sure the recipient is still the name owner. You can also {1} and set a pointer to one of your public addresses.

readMore.msg: {0} about tipping and claiming cryptocurrency tips.

verified.title: Verified URL
verified.msg: The Superhero Wallet identifies this URL as verified. This means that æternity blockchain account address has been found on the web page and tips can be claimed by its owner.

not-verified.title: Not verified URL
not-verified.msg: This means that we could not find æternity blockchain account address at this URL. The URL owner will be able to claim all tips accumulated as soon as they add their account address to the web page content.

blacklisted.title: Inaccessible URL
blacklisted.msg: The Superhero Wallet can tip any public URL. Currently, web pages that require logging in to view information can not be tipped.

not-secure.title: Not secure URL
not-secure.msg: Superhero Wallet is marking HTTP sites as "Not secure" - please, use URLs with HTTPS, only. The S in HTTPS stands for "secure." The TLS (or SSL) certificate proves that the server is actually the legitimate host of the website. Website using HTTPS are more trustworthy and secure, for both users and website owners.

error-log.title: Something went wrong
error-log.content: Please provide more information about the error you encountered so we can improve our superpowers. No personal data will be collected.

donate-errors.title: Your error report has been sent
donate-errors.msg: Thank you for being such a helpful Superhero!

donate-errors-error.title: Your error report was not sent
donate-errors-error.msg: There was problem sending your error report.

invalid-qr-code.msg: The scanned QR code is invalid.

confirmTransactionSign.senderReplaced: Your active wallet account will be the sender for the transaction.
confirmTransactionSign.unableToExecute: This transaction can not be executed.
confirmTransactionSign.confirmSigning: would like you to confirm a transaction.

warning.title: Transaction warning
warning.content: Transaction data is either broken or Superhero Wallet doesn’t support this type of transactions yet. Signing it may cause unexpected results including loss of your funds or other malicious effects.{0}{0}Be careful and sign the data only if you trust the aepp and its owner.

confirmUnsafeSign.heading: would like you to sign data.
confirmUnsafeSign.superheroChatJwtSign: would like you to sign a message in order to login.
confirmUnsafeSign.title: Sign data
confirmUnsafeSign.typeUnknown: The data is of unknown type.
confirmUnsafeSign.warning: Sign the data only if you trust the dapp and its owner.

qrCodeReader.noWebcamSubtitle: Please enable your device camera and check again if it is functioning properly.
qrCodeReader.subtitle: Allow Superhero Wallet to access your camera in order to scan QR codes.
qrCodeReader.qrCodeHasMultipleFragments: In order to sign this transaction you need to scan multiple QR codes. Keep your camera focused on the changing QRs until all codes have been scanned.

name-pointers-help.title: Name pointers
name-pointers-help.msg: Name pointer associates a .chain name with an account address so that the name becomes human-readable alias of the address.

auctions-help.title: Auctions and bidding
auctions-help.msg: If your .chain name is {'<'}strong{'>'}12 characters or less{'<'}/strong{'>'} – you have to bid for it in an auction. To win the bidding process, all you should do is to have the highest bid once the auction ends! If somebody outbids you – all of your funds are automatically returned.{'<'}br /{'>'}{'<'}br /{'>'}Auction periods and initial fees vary as the length of the name varies – the shorter the name, the higher the fee and longer the period.

nameAutoExtendHelp.title: Autoextend name
nameAutoExtendHelp.msg: In order to encourage the active usage of .chain names their ownership is limited in time by default.{'<'}br /{'>'}{'<'}br /{'>'} Selecting the auto-extend option guarantees that you will not lose the ownership of a .chain name.{'<'}br /{'>'}{'<'}br /{'>'} Your .chain name will be auto-extended at the cost of a simple name update transaction (under a penny as you are taking advantage of the super-low transaction fees of aeternity blockchain).

receive.title: Receive {name} to public address
receive.shareTextNoAmount: My {protocolName} address: {address} Or send with Superhero Wallet: {walletLink}
receive.shareTextWithAmount: {amount} {coinSymbol} has been requested. Send to {protocolName} address: {address} Or send with Superhero Wallet: {walletLink}

send.recipientPlaceholderUrl: Enter public address, .chain name or URL

multisigTxProposal.title: Multisig transaction proposal
multisigTxProposal.tokenWarning: Multisig transactions currently support AE coin only.

wrongNetwork.title: Network discrepancy
wrongNetwork.msg: This action was initiated on a different network. Please switch to {0} in your wallet settings to proceed.

accountDetails.assetsNotAvailable: Assets list is not available offline.
accountDetails.transactionsNotAvailable: Transactions history is not available offline.
accountDetails.namesNotAvailable: Names list is not available offline.

claimGiftCard.title: Redeem gift card
claimGiftCard.alreadyRedeemed: This gift card has already been redeemed.

importAccount.scanDescription: Scan the QR code from your AirGap vault in order to pair wallets and import accounts.

importConfirmDialog.title: Import account from AirGap
importConfirmDialog.description: Scan the QR code generated by your AirGap vault or copy/paste it here in order to import account. Make sure you set AirGap to use QR code V3.

signMessageErrorModal.title: Failed to sign message
signMessageErrorModal.msg: This action cannot be completed at the moment as it requires signing a message with your AirGap account.{'<'}br /{'>'}{'<'}br /{'>'}Signing messages is currently not supported for AirGap accounts.

send.title: Send funds from AirGap account
send.reviewSubtitle: Scan the QR code below or copy/paste it in your AirGap vault in order to sign the transaction. Click “Next” to proceed.

broadcast.title: Broadcast transaction
broadcast.subtitle: Scan the QR code generated by your AirGap vault or copy/paste it here in order to broadcast the signed transaction. Make sure you set AirGap to use QR code V3.

scan.title: Scan the QR code from your AirGap vault in order to sign the transaction.

help.title: Sign and send AirGap transaction
help.msg: In  order to sign an AirGap transaction and broadcast it from Superhero Wallet you need to follow 3 simple steps: {'<'}br /{'>'}{'<'}br /{'>'}{'<'}ol{'>'}{'<'}li {'>'}Scan the QR code generated by Superhero Wallet with your AirGap vault.{'<'}br /{'>'}{'<'}br /{'>'}Alternatively you may copy the code in Superhero Wallet and paste it in your AirGap vault. {'<'}/li {'>'}{'<'}li {'>'}Sign the transaction in your AirGap vault. Another QR code will be generated by AirGap vault.{'<'}br /{'>'}{'<'}br /{'>'}Make sure you set AirGap to use QR code V3.{'<'}/li {'>'}{'<'}li {'>'}Scan the QR code generated by AirGap vault with Superhero Wallet and confirm broadcasting the transaction.{'<'}br /{'>'}{'<'}br /{'>'}Alternatively you may copy the code from the AirGap vault, paste it in your Superhero Wallet and then broadcast the transaction.{'<'}/li {'>'}{'<'}/ol{'>'}

autoLock.descriptionPart1: Superhero Wallet will be locked after the preset time interval of inactivity.
autoLock.descriptionPart2: You will be asked to authenticate in order to unlock the screen and continue using the wallet.
